attributes.action: Reinstate the Death Penalty (Death by Hanging)  for the most heinous crimes.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon Her Majesties Government to reinstate the Death Penalty  - Death by hanging for the most heinous of crimes. To name but a few, murder, rape (Inc child rape) treason etc. 

Society is becoming to violent with out fear of punishment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly which criminal offences you mean by "the most heinous crimes". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
